data.title: Abidemi Sanusi
data.meta_description: Born in Lagos Made in London Writes. Hi, I'm Abidemi Sanusi. I'm an author, digital geek and former human rights worker. Of course I write my own books, but I may or may not have ghostwritten other books. CHECK OUT MY BOOKS MORE ABOUT ME I write books. I write commercial fiction as Abidemi Sanusi and
data.text:
Hi, I’m Abidemi Sanusi. I’m an author, digital geek and former human rights worker. Of course I write my own books, but I may or may not have ghostwritten other books.

I write commercial fiction as Abidemi Sanusi and Christian books as Levi Read. My book, ‘Eyo’, was nominated for the Commonwealth Writers’ Prize. My latest book, ‘Looking for Bono’, is published by Jacaranda.

I’m a hobbying street photographer. You may or may have seen me on the streets of London with my trusty 10-year-old DSLR camera. My prints will be soon be available to buy.

In my other life, I run Mostly Plantbased, a glutenfree, dairyfree and nutfree blog and meal-planning service.

I’m working hard on my first recipe book and I can’t wait to share it with you. You should be able to pre-order it soon. But in the meantime, click to join the waitlist!
